atk-abh03a42:2_0: 1-9. Idāni mūlayamake desiteyeva kusalādidhamme āyatanavasenāpi saṅgaṇhitvā khandhayamakānantaraṁ
atk-abh03a42:2_1: desitassa āyatanayamakassa vaṇṇanā hoti. Tattha khandhayamake vuttanayeneva pāḷivavatthānaṁ
atk-abh03a42:2_2: veditabbaṁ. Yatheva hi tattha paṇṇattivāro, pavattivāro, pariññāvāroti tayo mahāvārā
atk-abh03a42:2_3: honti, tathā idhāpi. Vacanatthopi nesaṁ tattha vuttanayeneva veditabbo. Idhāpi ca
atk-abh03a42:2_4: paṇṇattivāro uddesaniddesavasena dvidhā vavatthito. Itare niddesavaseneva. ‘Tattha
atk-abh03a42:2_5: dvādasāyatanānī’ti padaṁ ādiṁ katvā yāva nāyatanā na manoti, tāva paṇṇattivārassa
atk-abh03a42:2_6: uddesavāro veditabbo. Tattha dvādasāyatanānīti ayaṁ yamakavasena pucchitabbānaṁ āyatanānaṁ
atk-abh03a42:2_7: uddeso. Cakkhāyatanaṁ…pe… dhammāyatananti tesaññeva pabhedato nāmavavatthānaṁ. Yamakavasena
atk-abh03a42:2_8: pucchāsukhatthañcettha paṭhamaṁ paṭipāṭiyā ajjhattarūpāyatanāni vuttāni. Pacchā bāhirarūpāyatanāni.
atk-abh03a42:3_0: Yathā pana heṭṭhā khandhavasena, evamidha imesaṁ āyatanānaṁ vasena padasodhanavāro,
atk-abh03a42:3_2: nayavārā honti. Ekeko cettha anulomapaṭilomavasena duvidhoyeva. Tesamattho tattha
atk-abh03a42:3_3: vuttanayeneva veditabbo. Yathā pana khandhayamake padasodhanavārassa anulomavāre
atk-abh03a42:3_4: ‘rūpaṁ rūpakkhandho, rūpakkhandho rūpa’ntiādīni pañca yamakāni, tathā idha ‘cakkhu,
atk-abh03a42:3_5: cakkhāyatanaṁ; cakkhāyatanaṁ; cakkhū’tiādīni dvādasa. Paṭilomavārepi ‘na cakkhu,
atk-abh03a42:3_6: na cakkhāyatanaṁ; na cakkhāyatanaṁ, na cakkhū’tiādīni dvādasa , padasodhanamūlacakkavārassa
atk-abh03a42:3_7: panettha anulomavāre ekekāyatanamūlakāni ekādasa ekādasa katvā dvattiṁsasataṁ yamakāni.
atk-abh03a42:3_8: Paṭilomavārepi dvattiṁsasatameva. Suddhāyatanavārassāpi anulomavāre dvādasa, paṭilomavāre
atk-abh03a42:3_9: dvādasa, suddhāyatanamūlacakkavārassāpi anulomavāre ekekāyatanamūlakāni ekādasa ekādasa
atk-abh03a42:3_10: katvā dvattiṁsasataṁ yamakāni. Paṭilomavārepi dvattiṁsasatamevāti evamidha chasattatādhikehi
atk-abh03a42:3_11: pañcahi yamakasatehi, dvipaññāsādhikehi ekādasahi pucchāsatehi, caturādhikehi tevīsāya
atk-abh03a42:3_12: atthasatehi ca paṭimaṇḍito paṇṇattivārassa uddesavāro veditabbo.
atk-abh03a42:6_0: 10-17. Niddesavāre pana heṭṭhā khandhayamakassa paṇṇattivāraniddese vuttanayeneva
atk-abh03a42:6_1: attho veditabbo. Aññatra visesā. Tatrāyaṁ viseso – dibbacakkhūti dutiyavijjāñāṇaṁ.
atk-abh03a42:6_2: Paññācakkhūti tatiyavijjāñāṇaṁ. Dibbasotanti dutiyaabhiññāñāṇaṁ. Taṇhāsotanti taṇhāva.
atk-abh03a42:6_3: Avaseso kāyoti nāmakāyo, rūpakāyo, hatthikāyo, assakāyoti evamādi. Avasesaṁ rūpanti
atk-abh03a42:6_4: rūpāyatanato sesaṁ bhūtupādāyarūpañceva piyarūpasātarūpañca. Sīlagandhotiādīni vāyanaṭṭhena
atk-abh03a42:6_5: sīlādīnaṁyeva nāmāni. Attharasotiādīnipi sādhumadhuraṭṭhena atthādīnaññeva nāmāni.
atk-abh03a42:9_0: 18-21. Idhāpi ca pavattivārassa uppādavārādīsu tīsu antaravāresu ekekasmiṁ chaḷeva
atk-abh03a42:9_1: kālabhedā. Tesaṁ ekekasmiṁ kāle puggalavārādayo tayo vārā. Te sabbepi anulomapaṭilomanayavasena
atk-abh03a42:9_2: duvidhāva honti. Tattha paccuppannakāle puggalavārassa anulomanaye yathā khandhayamake
atk-abh03a42:9_4: dve, saṅkhārakkhandhamūlakaṁ ekanti aggahitaggahaṇena dasa yamakāni honti. Evaṁ ‘‘yassa
atk-abh03a42:9_5: cakkhāyatanaṁ uppajjati, tassa sotāyatanaṁ uppajjati; yassa vā pana sotāyatanaṁ uppajjati,
atk-abh03a42:9_6: tassa cakkhāyatanaṁ uppajjati; yassa cakkhāyatanaṁ uppajjati, tassa ghāṇāyatanaṁ,
atk-abh03a42:9_7: jivhāyatanaṁ, kāyāyatanaṁ, rūpāyatanaṁ, saddāyatanaṁ, gandhāyatanaṁ, rasāyatanaṁ,
atk-abh03a42:9_8: phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṁ, manāyatanaṁ, dhammāyatanaṁ, uppajjati; yassa vā pana dhammāyatanaṁ
atk-abh03a42:9_9: uppajjati, tassa cakkhāyatanaṁ uppajjatī’’ti evaṁ cakkhāyatanamūlakāni ekādasa. ‘‘Yassa
atk-abh03a42:9_10: sotāyatanaṁ uppajjati, tassa ghānāyatanaṁ uppajjatī’’tiādinā nayena sotāyatanamūlakāni
atk-abh03a42:9_11: dasa; ghānāyatanamūlakāni nava, jivhāyatanamūlakāni aṭṭha; kāyāyatanamūlakāni satta;
atk-abh03a42:9_12: rūpāyatanamūlakāni cha; saddāyatanamūlakāni pañca; gandhāyatanamūlakāni cattāri;
atk-abh03a42:9_13: rasāyatanamūlakāni tīṇi; phoṭṭhabbāyatanamūlakāni dve; manāyatanamūlakaṁ ekanti aggahitaggahaṇena
atk-abh03a42:10_0: Tattha cakkhāyatanamūlakesu ekādasasu ‘‘yassa cakkhāyatanaṁ uppajjati, tassa sotāyatanaṁ,
atk-abh03a42:10_1: ghānāyatanaṁ, rūpāyatanaṁ, manāyatanaṁ, dhammāyatanaṁ uppajjatī’’ti imāni pañceva
atk-abh03a42:10_2: vissajjitāni. Tesu paṭhamaṁ vissajjetabbaṁ tāva vissajjitaṁ. Dutiyaṁ kiñcāpi paṭhamena
atk-abh03a42:10_3: sadisavissajjanaṁ, cakkhusotāyatanānaṁ pavattiṭṭhāne pana ghānāyatanassa na ekantena
atk-abh03a42:10_4: pavattito ‘‘kathaṁ nu kho etaṁ vissajjetabba’’nti vimatinivāraṇatthaṁ vissajjitaṁ.
atk-abh03a42:10_5: Rūpāyatanamanāyatanadhammāyatanehi saddhiṁ tīṇi yamakāni asadisavissajjanattā vissajjitāni.
atk-abh03a42:10_6: Sesesu jivhāyatanakāyāyatanehi tāva saddhiṁ dve yamakāni purimehi dvīhi saddhiṁ sadisavissajjanāni.
atk-abh03a42:10_7: Saddāyatanassa paṭisandhikkhaṇe anuppattito tena saddhiṁ yamakassa vissajjanameva
atk-abh03a42:10_8: natthi. Gandharasaphoṭṭhabbāyatanehipi saddhiṁ tīṇi yamakāni purimehi dvīhi sadisavissajjanāneva
atk-abh03a42:10_9: hontīti tantiyā lahubhāvatthaṁ saṅkhittāni. Sotāyatanamūlakesu yaṁ labbhati , taṁ
atk-abh03a42:10_10: purimehi sadisavissajjanamevāti ekampi pāḷiṁ nāruḷhaṁ. Ghānāyatanamūlakesu rūpāyatanena
atk-abh03a42:10_11: saddhiṁ ekaṁ, manāyatanadhammāyatanehi saddhiṁ dveti tīṇi yamakāni pāḷiṁ āruḷhāni.
atk-abh03a42:10_12: Sesāni ghānāyatanayamakena sadisavissajjanattā nāruḷhāni. Tathā jivhāyatanakāyāyatanamūlakāni.
atk-abh03a42:10_13: Rūpāyatanamūlakesu manāyatanadhammāyatanehi saddhiṁ dveyeva vissajjitāni. Gandharasaphoṭṭhabbehi
atk-abh03a42:10_14: pana saddhiṁ tīṇi rūpāyatanamanāyatanehi saddhiṁ sadisavissajjanāni. Yatheva hettha
atk-abh03a42:10_16: arasakānaṁ aphoṭṭhabbakāna’’nti yojanā veditabbā. Gandhādīni cettha āyatanabhūtāneva
atk-abh03a42:10_17: adhippetāni. Tasmā ‘‘sarūpakānaṁ sagandhāyatanāna’’nti āyatanavasenettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-abh03a42:11_1: cattāri tīṇi dve ca heṭṭhimehi sadisavissajjanattā pāḷiṁ nāruḷhāni. Manāyatanamūlakaṁ
atk-abh03a42:11_2: vissajjitamevāti evametāni paccuppannakāle puggalavārassa anulomanaye katipayayamakavissajjaneneva
atk-abh03a42:11_3: chasaṭṭhiyamakāni vissajjitāni nāma hontīti veditabbāni. Yathā ca puggalavāre, evaṁ
atk-abh03a42:11_4: okāsavārepi puggalokāsavārepi chasaṭṭhīti paccuppannakāle tīsu vāresu anulomanaye
atk-abh03a42:11_5: aṭṭhanavutisataṁ yamakāni honti. Yathā ca anulomanaye, evaṁ paṭilomanayepīti sabbānipi
atk-abh03a42:11_6: paccuppannakāle channavutādhikāni tīṇi yamakasatāni honti. Tesu dvānavutādhikāni
atk-abh03a42:11_7: satta pucchāsatāni, caturāsītādhikāni ca pannarasa atthasatāni hontīti veditabbāni.
atk-abh03a42:11_8: Evaṁ sesesupi pañcasu kālabhedesūti sabbānipi chasattatādhikāni tevīsati yamakasatāni.
atk-abh03a42:11_9: Tato diguṇā pucchā, tato diguṇā atthāti idamettha uppādavāre pāḷivavatthānaṁ. Nirodhavārauppādanirodhavāresupi
atk-abh03a42:11_10: eseva nayoti. Sabbasmimpi pavattivāre aṭṭhavīsāni ekasattati yamakasatāni. Tato diguṇā
atk-abh03a42:11_11: pucchā, tato diguṇā atthā veditabbā. Pāḷi pana manāyatanaṁ dhammāyatanañca ekasadisaṁ,
atk-abh03a42:11_12: nānaṁ natthi. Upari pana ‘‘vārasaṅkhepo hotī’’tiādīni vatvā tattha tattha saṅkhittā.
atk-abh03a42:11_13: Tasmā yaṁ tattha tattha saṅkhittaṁ, taṁ sabbaṁ asammuyhantehi sallakkhetabbaṁ.
atk-abh03a42:12_0: Atthavinicchaye panettha idaṁ nayamukhaṁ. Sacakkhukānaṁ asotakānanti apāye jātibadhiraopapātikaṁ
atk-abh03a42:12_1: sandhāya vuttaṁ. So hi sacakkhuko asotako hutvā upapajjati. Yathāha – ‘‘kāmadhātuyā
atk-abh03a42:12_2: upapattikkhaṇe kassaci aparāni dasāyatanāni pātubhavanti. Opapātikānaṁ petānaṁ ,
atk-abh03a42:12_3: opapātikānaṁ asurānaṁ, opapātikānaṁ tiracchānagatānaṁ, opapātikānaṁ nerayikānaṁ;
atk-abh03a42:12_5: manāyatanaṁ dhammāyatana’’nti. Sacakkhukānaṁ sasotakānanti sugatiduggatīsu paripuṇṇāyatane
atk-abh03a42:12_6: ca opapātike rūpībrahmāno ca sandhāya vuttaṁ. Te hi sacakkhukā sasotakā hutvā upapajjanti.
atk-abh03a42:12_7: Yathāha – ‘‘kāmadhātuyā upapattikkhaṇe kassaci ekādasāyatanāni pātubhavanti; kāmāvacarānaṁ
atk-abh03a42:12_8: devānaṁ, paṭhamakappikānaṁ manussānaṁ, opapātikānaṁ petānaṁ, opapātikānaṁ asurānaṁ,
atk-abh03a42:12_9: opapātikānaṁ tiracchānagatānaṁ, opapātikānaṁ nerayikānaṁ, paripuṇṇāyatanānaṁ. Rūpadhātuyā
atk-abh03a42:12_10: upapattikkhaṇe pañcāyatanāni pātubhavanti, cakkhāyatanaṁ rūpasotamanāyatanaṁ dhammāyatana’’nti.
atk-abh03a42:13_0: Aghānakānanti brahmapārisajjādayo sandhāya vuttaṁ. Te hi sacakkhukā aghānakā hutvā
atk-abh03a42:13_1: upapajjanti. Kāmadhātuyaṁ pana aghānako opapātiko natthi. Yadi bhaveyya ‘‘kassaci
atk-abh03a42:13_2: aṭṭhāyatanāni pātubhavantī’’ti vedayya. Yo gabbhaseyyako pana aghānako siyā, so ‘‘sacakkhukāna’’nti
atk-abh03a42:13_3: vacanato idha anadhippeto. Sacakkhukānaṁ saghānakānanti jaccabadhirampi paripuṇṇāyatanampi
atk-abh03a42:13_4: opapātikaṁ sandhāya vuttaṁ. Saghānakānaṁ acakkhukānanti jaccandhampi jaccabadhirampi
atk-abh03a42:13_5: opapātikaṁ sandhāya vuttameva. Saghānakānaṁ sacakkhukānanti paripuṇṇāyatanameva opapātikaṁ sandhāya vuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a42:14_0: Sarūpakānaṁ acakkhukānanti ettha jaccandhajaccabadhiraopapātikesu aññataropi gabbhaseyyakopi
atk-abh03a42:14_1: labbhatiyeva. Sacittakānaṁ acakkhukānanti ettha heṭṭhā vuttehi jaccandhādīhi tīhi
atk-abh03a42:14_2: saddhiṁ arūpinopi labbhanti. Acakkhukānanti ettha purimapade vuttehi catūhi saddhiṁ
atk-abh03a42:14_3: asaññasattāpi labbhanti. Sarūpakānaṁ aghānakānanti ettha gabbhaseyyakā ca asaññasattā
atk-abh03a42:14_4: ca sesarūpībrahmāno ca labbhanti. Sacittakānaṁ aghānakānanti ettha gabbhaseyyakā
atk-abh03a42:14_5: ca rūpārūpabrahmāno ca labbhanti. Acittakānaṁ arūpakānantipadesu pana ekavokāracatuvokārasattāva
atk-abh03a42:14_6: labbhantīti iminā nayena sabbesu puggalavāresu puggalavibhāgo veditabbo.
atk-abh03a42:15_0: 22-254. Okāsavāre yattha cakkhāyatananti rūpībrahmalokaṁ pucchati. Teneva āmantāti
atk-abh03a42:15_1: vuttaṁ . Tasmiñhi tale niyamato tāni āyatanāni paṭisandhiyaṁ uppajjanti. Idamettha
atk-abh03a42:15_2: nayamukhaṁ. Iminā nayamukhena sakalepi pavattivāre attho veditabbo. Pariññāvāro khandhayamake vuttanayoyevāti.
